functions.name: optimizeWidthsBruteforce
functions.docstring: Bruteforce version.  Veeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeery slow.  Only works for smallests of fonts.

functions.name: optimizeWidths
functions.docstring:
Given a list of glyph widths, or dictionary mapping glyph width to number of
glyphs having that, returns a tuple of best CFF default and nominal glyph widths.

This algorithm is linear in UPEM+numGlyphs.
